pullrequest.title: Add bloom and lens flare plugins

content.raw:
Gazebo's default settings should definitely look closer to that, the first impression is amazing! The flat look we currently have probably makes more sense for applications where full control of rendering is the focus, but since our focus is robotics, the default rendering should be nicer :)

Just one little detail I noticed, the boundary between the sphere's illuminated side and the not-illuminated one is pretty abrupt from some angles, but quite nice from most angles:

Abrupt:

![sphere.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/RLzBkE/images/1742070749-sphere.png)

Smooth:

![sphere2.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/RLzBkE/images/2813943521-sphere2.png)
